name: ArduinoGotchi M5 Enhanced
description: A real Tamagotchi P1 emulator for M5StickC Plus2 with enhanced 90s retro features, animated starfield background, sound effects, and WiFi portal system.
author: Enhanced by AI Assistant
instructions: First boot: Set the clock using A (hours), B (minutes), PWR (confirm)
Feed your pet regularly to keep it happy
Clean up waste when it appears
Watch your pet grow from baby to adult over time
Game state saves automatically every 2 minutes
Hold B for 2+ seconds to toggle between 90s colors and classic mode
